prerequisite: Avenger, Censure of Pursuit class feature, oath of enmity power
name: Ardent Champion
text: Most avengers undergo training in secret temples or monasteries to prepare for their service and receive their powers through rites of initiation, but some are endowed with divine power simply through raw devotion to their god. Such avengers dig deep within themselves to find unmatched reserves of faith, making up for their lack of formal training with holy passion. These are ardent champions.

features.ardentAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can also make a saving throw or shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier before or after the extra action
features.holyArdor(11thLevel): Whenever you make two attack rolls because of your oath of enmity and hit the target of your attack, you score a critical hit if both dice have the same roll, except if both rolls are 1
features.ardentFury(16thLevel): Once per round when you score a critical hit against your oath of enmity target, you can shift 1 square and make a basic attack against that target as a free action

flavorText: The fires of heaven inflame my soul. I am a sword in the hand of my god. Death means nothing to me!
